title: reconnect when not in game
body:
logging in is not happening it just loads and nothing happens and it tells me to reconnect when am not even in a game what is happening right now??
i hope am not getting a ban please if i do remove it, because it may count me as afk{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: There were some server issues going on with EUNE for a few hours, but has since been resolved. Let me know if you're still having issues with this.
